备注: 每道题必须包含以下四条数据:
Q: 问题, 空必须为7个下划线
A: 答案, 列表格式, 可以有多个答案
ana: 解析，英文(半角)标点加空格，中文(全角)标点不要带空格
tags: 考点, 特点相关标签

questions.Q: When fat and salt _______ (remove) from food, the food tastes as if it is missing something.
questions.ana: 一般现在时的被动语态。

questions.Q: _______ (learn) more about Chinese culture, Jack has decided to take Chinese folk music as an elective course.
questions.ana: 根据句式分析，该题有一个谓语，且无连词，故应填非谓语，根据句意可知此处表目的，故填 To learn。

questions.Q: Much time _______ (spend) sitting at a desk, office workers are generally troubled by health problems.
questions.ana: 根据句式分析，该题只有一个谓语，且无连词，尽管前半句很长，但也应填非谓语，“spend”与“much time”之间为被动关系，故填过去分词 spent。

questions.Q: Children, when _______ (accompany) by their parents, are allowed to enter the stadium.
questions.ana: 本题考查非谓语动词作状语。主语“children”与“accompany”之间为逻辑上的被动关系。

questions.Q: In the last few years, China _______ (make) great achievements in environmental protection.
questions.ana: 根据时间状语“in the last few years”可知，此处使用现在完成时态，主语与“make”之间为主动关系，且为单数。

questions.Q: The book I wrote last year ________ (print) and it will soon come out.
questions.ana: 根据“It will soon come out”可知当前正在印刷中，“the book”与“print”之间为被动关系，故用现在进行时态的被动语态。

questions.Q: Just as I got to the school gate, I realized I _______ (leave) my book in the cafe.
questions.ana: “realized”为一般过去时，其后面宾语从句中的动作发生在其之前，故用过去完成时。
